snippet: Pedro Alvarez hit a grand slam, and Andrew McCutchen had two hits before leaving with a sore left wrist, helping the visiting Pittsburgh Pirates beat St. Louis for their fourth victory in a row.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Pittsburgh Pirates beat the St Louis Cardinals, 7-3; other scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Pedro Alvarez hit a grand slam, and Andrew McCutchen had two hits before leaving with a sore left wrist, helping the visiting Pittsburgh Pirates beat St. Louis for their fourth victory in a row.

headline.seo: At Seven Games Over .500, Pirates Play Unseasonably Hot Ball
headline.main: Pirates Are Playing Unseasonably Hot Ball
headline.print_headline: Pirates Are Playing Unseasonably Hot Ball
